content: jojo the giraffe materials crochet hooks body parts - size g 4 22 mm embellishments size f 3 75mm contrasting colors of worsted weight yarn approximately ½ skein each stitch marker s tapestry needle fiberfill for stuffing pipe cleaner approx 12 in long 2 screw-on black eyes 10 mm note this project is done in the round do not join the rounds with a slip_stitch unless otherwise stated use a stitch marker to mark the beginning or ending stitch of each round moving to new round as the marked stitch is worked back leg make 2 foundation round using darker colored yarn make a slip knot leaving long tail chain 2 then make 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 1 without turning make 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet of foundation row *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 12 single_crochet round 2 *1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 18 single_crochet round 3-4 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet of previous round 18 single_crochet using long tail of slip knot sew middle hole shut round 5 *1 single_crochet next single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease in next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 12 single_crochet round 6 repeat round 3 12 single_crochet stuff with fiberfill to desired firmness round 7 1 single_crochet in each of the next 11 single_crochet in next single_crochet insert hook yo and draw loop up onto hook without completing final yo and pull through switch to lighter color see fig 1 12 single_crochet round 8 repeat round 5 8 single_crochet cut off darker color leaving short tail and stuff both color tails down into foot round 9-23 repeat round 3 8sc stuff as you go along leaving top of tube approx last two row empty round 24 repeat round 3 8 single_crochet do not finish off push end of tube flat together and single_crochet through both layers across top 4 single_crochet to sew shut see fig 2 finish off leaving a long tail for sewing on to body front leg make 2 repeat instructions for back leg up to round 23 round 24-26 repeat round 3 8sc stuff as you go along leaving top of tube approx last two row empty round 27 repeat round 3 8 single_crochet do not finish off push end of tube flat together and single_crochet through both layers across top 4 single_crochet to sew shut see fig 2 finish off leaving a long tail for sewing on to body © andrea moberly 2008 body and neck for the body and neck a technique called tapestry crochet will be used before beginning this section please read the enclosed information on tapestry crochet foundation round using lighter colored yarn make a slip knot leaving long tail chain 2 then make 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 1 without turning make 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet of foundation row *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 12 single_crochet
